title: Tayutau Hanairo
description:
A student at a Japanese women's academy in the 1910's, Higashikuze Miyoko is forced to question her picture of the ideal Japanese woman when she meets Fujiwaka Mari, a "New Woman" who wants to shrug off the prescribed path and paint her own future.

A oneshot from Dr. Pepperco, author of Sayonara Rose Garden. Appeared in the September 2020 issue of Yuri Hime.
